attributes.additional_details:
I’m making this petition because the public where given the decision of Remaining or Leaving and ever since we voted leave we’ve had this threat dandiling over us. 

The House Of Commons are putting themselves first. They must deliver on the referendum. If we leave with no deal so be it but we must not extend Article 50.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has consistently said that we would leave the EU on the 29th of March 2019. However as we now approach the date she seems to be going back on her word.
